text: Baddies is an American reality television series which premiered on the Zeus Network on May 16, 2021. It was developed as an unofficial spin-off to the reality series Bad Girls Club. == Series overview == Season Episodes Originally released First released Last released 1 12 May 16, 2021 August 22, 2021 2 17 June 12, 2022 October 9, 2022 3 16 January 22, 2023 May 21, 2023 4 23 September 17, 2023 February 25, 2024 5 23 May 5, 2024 October 20, 2024 6 26 November 3, 2024 April 27, 2025 7 TBA May 11, 2025 TBA
